title: Movement - 🤝┃start-here
html:
# Hello Movers! Welcome to the Movement :angry_moveus: 

We're building the first integrated blockchain network, powering the fastest and most secure Layer Two on Ethereum and championing the use of Move, a safe and fast language desingned especially for smart contracts.

📢 Here are the **key steps** to becoming part of the Movement: **Study. Battle. Build.**

> "Before we can **Build**, we must win the Battle. Before we can win the **Battle**, we must **Study** the ways of Movement" - Merqus Aurelius, from *The Chronicles of Integration*

1️⃣ **Study** 📖 
- **This is the first critical step to joining our Community and preparing for testnet!**
- Begin your Journey and earn your @Study. Battle. Build. role by completing the Galxe quests here: https://app.galxe.com/quest/Movement/GC4Uwtd8Hr
- Many great resources can help you learn about Movement:
👉 **Community Program and Guilds Guide:** https://bit.ly/MoveCommunityProgram
👉 **Movement Overview:** https://movementlabs.notion.site/Welcome-To-The-Movement-579de416616f4ef5b80de95fc5007519
👉 **Move Data Room:** https://movementlabs.notion.site/Move-Learning-Data-Room-1de7701e2d1649ab9412364db92d162d
👉 #🔗┃useful-links 

2️⃣ **Battle** ⚔️ 
- The **Battle Of Olympus** is our massive testnet hackathon 🗻 
- If you are a **builder, dev, or represent a team**, sign up at https://olympus.movementlabs.xyz/
- **IF YOU ARE NOT A DEV, you don't need to sign up!** BUT, don't worry because there are tons of ways that our writers, memers, chatters, and tweeters and more can do to help **fight the Battle!** The **Guilds** will be your way to participate and rise up in the ranks of the Movement.
- **You can preview the Guilds** at https://bit.ly/MoveCommunityProgram and the quest lines to earn you the right to become a member of the Guilds will be released here in the coming days. **Stay Watchful** :salutepepe: 

3️⃣ **Build** 🧱 
- The final phase is **Building The Parthenon** 🏦 
- This is our **testnet experience** for our whole Community at https://testnet.movementlabs.xyz/
- Learn more and **get your @Testnetters role to be notified of updates** at #🏛┃testnet-guide 
Looking forward to our Journey together and the ways you will contribute, shape, and govern this Community!

**Study. Battle. Build.** :AAAAAAAA_1: 

**PLEASE NOTE: We do not have a token, there is no current presale, and there is no current airdrop!** Anyone offering any of these is trying to scam you. Stay safe, Movers! :MoveusHug:
